name: #SheTunedOut
description:
THIS PROJECT HAS BEEN CREATED FOR HACC-CON 2019.

You are a viewer, a watcher,  fuel for the entertainment machine. Choose your streamers and follow them along on their journey. Will you tune into Valentine, the insecure socialite? Maybe Tippi, the rebel with a cause? Or maybe Eve, the girl who will do anything for views?

-

  • Participate in 'surveys' which judge your own willingness to consent to voluntary data collection!
  • Reflect upon your own social media habits!
  • Multiple endings, you decide the fate of those involved!
  • This game incorporates various communication theories as well as ethical theories including but not limited to social exchange theory, uncertainty reduction theory, cognitive dissonance, communication privacy management, and more.
